hero.title: Welcome to La Tavola
hero.subtitle: Authentic Italian Flavors in the Heart of the City
hero.description: Experience the finest Italian cuisine with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes passed down through generations.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Discover our carefully curated selection of authentic Italian dishes
menu.noItems: We're working on delicious items for this category

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: A Journey of Authentic Italian Cuisine
about.content: Founded in 1985 by Chef Giuseppe Rossi, La Tavola has been bringing authentic Italian cuisine to food lovers for over three decades. Our passion for traditional recipes, combined with the finest imported ingredients, creates an unforgettable dining experience.

stepsToOrder.title: How to Order
stepsToOrder.subtitle: Simple Steps to Enjoy Our Delicious Food
stepsToOrder.description: Follow these easy steps to place your order and enjoy our authentic Italian cuisine

step1.title: Scan QR Code
step1.description: Simply scan the QR code on your table to access our digital menu

step2.title: Explore Menu
step2.description: Browse through all our delicious products and discover your favorites

step3.title: Add to Cart
step3.description: Add any items to your order and include special notes before confirming

step4.title: Wait & Enjoy
step4.description: Relax and wait just a few minutes - your fresh order will be ready soon

cta.title: Ready to Order?
cta.description: Start your culinary journey with us today!

orderAgain.title: Order Again
orderAgain.subtitle: Quick access to your recent orders and favorites

emptyCart.title: Your cart is empty
emptyCart.description: Add some delicious items to get started!

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.scanText: Scan this QR code to access the menu or click "Visit Demo" below
qrGenerator.securityNote: Contains JWT token for secure table identification
qrGenerator.userDescription: Generate QR codes for customer tables to access the digital menu
qrGenerator.adminDescription: Generate QR code for table access with secure authentication
qrGenerator.printSubtitle: Scan to explore our delicious menu!

step1.title: Generate QR Code
step1.description: Create a unique QR code that links directly to your menu

step2.title: Customer Scans
step2.description: Customers scan the QR code with their mobile device camera

step3.title: Browse & Order
step3.description: Explore the menu, add items to cart, and complete the order
